participant_1.background:
I do my best to be a good parent, but it's not always easy.
i cannot choose between lollipops and rainbows.
my favorite food is spaghetti and meatballs.
I'm always spilling drinks on myself at the beach, but I love it anyway.
I want to have more fun with my siblings.

participant_2.background:
I try to be mindful of my environmental impact, both at home and in my daily life.
My custom truck is my pride and joy.
i play bingo every wednesday with my husband.
I got to know my girlfriend better in the past year.
i am the oldest of 5 children.

content.text: Hey there, how's it going?
Pretty good! I'm just getting ready for work, and then after that I have a game of bingo with my husband.
That sounds fun! Do you play bingo often?
I play every Wednesday, it's our weekly date night.
That's so sweet! I love that you have a weekly date night.
Yeah, it's important to make time for each other, even when we're busy.
I agree! Do you have any other hobbies?
I try to be mindful of my environmental impact, both at home and in my daily life.
That's great! I think it's important to be conscious of our impact on the planet.
I'm glad you agree!
I do my best to be a good parent, but it's not always easy.
I'm sure you're doing a great job!
Thank you! I'm trying!
Do you have any other kids besides your daughter?
I have a son as well. He's about to turn 2.
Oh that's great! I have 5 siblings. I'm the oldest.
Wow! That's a lot of siblings!
Yeah, it can be a lot at times, but it's also a lot of fun.
I'm sure it is!
Yeah, it is
